description.value: Through your disciplined condensations and circulations of qi, you've caught a fleeting glimpse of cultivation's promise, and your health has handsomely profited along the way. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Breath Control], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Diehard], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Fast Recovery] feats. You must meet the prerequisites for these feats as normal. For each of these feats you already have, you can instead gain a different feat from the following list: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Canny Acumen], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Fleet], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Toughness].

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
